attributes.action: hold Sir John Chilcot's inquiry into the Iraq War in public, not in private.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The lead up to and invasion of Iraq by UK and US forces lead to the deaths of many many innocent civilians and UK/US servicemen and woman, fractured the United Nations and international relations, and brought the UK political system into disrepute. In memory of all those who lost their lives, and all those who were mislead, and to repair the damage to the UK democratic system, the Chilcot inquiry must be held fully in public.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
